html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-01262019-02-28,  GLPA,  TC,  ,  ,  , 
ActPilotage Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Great Lakes Pilotage Tariff Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the GREAT LAKES PILOTAGE TARIFF REGULATIONS in order to (1) levy tariffs that are fair and reasonable to remain financially self-sufficient; (2) continue to recruit and train apprentice pilots; (3) continue to enlist services from the service provider between the St. Lambert and Beauharnois Locks; (4) increase the basic charge in a way that addresses inflation and the exchange rate for pilotage services in Detroit; (5) clarify the intent of the Regulations pertaining to cancellation fees as requested by the Standing Joint Committee for the Scrutiny of Regulations; (6) ensure consistency with definitions found in the Great Lakes Pilotage Regulations; and (7) ensure consistency with the definitions found in the Public Ports and Public Port Facilities Regulations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2019-0056 Publication Date: 2019-03-20
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Great Lakes Pilotage Tariff Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the GREAT LAKES PILOTAGE TARIFF REGULATIONS in order to (1) levy tariffs that are fair and reasonable to remain financially self-sufficient; (2) continue to recruit and train apprentice pilots; (3) continue to enlist services from the service provider between the St. Lambert and Beauharnois Locks; (4) increase the basic charge in a way that addresses inflation and the exchange rate for pilotage services in Detroit; (5) clarify the intent of the Regulations pertaining to cancellation fees as requested by the Standing Joint Committee for the Scrutiny of Regulations; (6) ensure consistency with definitions found in the Great Lakes Pilotage Regulations; and (7) ensure consistency with the definitions found in the Public Ports and Public Port Facilities Regulations.
